dengu maduru kitayan bokirime chodanawa yatathe sakakaruwan adhikaranayata idiripath kota dada gassawa adhikaranaya pehosath kirima nowa kala yuthuwa aththe maduru kitayan bowana sthana handunagena nisi baladharin yodawa maduru dum gasa maduruwan mardanaya kirima yayi kolambaa athireka mahesthrath prasanna alwis mahatha eeye (11) mulleriyawa polisiyata awawada karamin pawasiya.maduru mardana wadasatahan kriyathmaka nokara nikarune niwasiyan athadanguwata gena adhikaranayata idiripath kirimen dengu wasangathaya thuran kala nohaki bawa pawasu mahesthrathwaraya min pasuwata pudgalayan nikarune adhikaranayata idiripath nokarana lesata polisiyata danum dunneya.mulleriyawa polisiya wisin dengu chodanawa yatathe pudgalayan pasdenaku adhikaranayata idiripath kara thibu athara owun adhikaranaya hamuwe warada piliganimen anathuruwa mahesthrathwaraya rupiyal 500ka dada mudalak niyama kaleya..
